note: I just want to figure out what's going on without tripping over bullies and getting all depressed. Happy to be here. Design, Media, & Tech prof. Interested in everything related, cyberlaw especially, plus web accessibility, meteorology, genealogy, and all sorts of cool things that manage to get my wandering attention. I'm inordinately fond of cats, Ireland, Aotearoa/New Zealand, and democracy.
